thread.title: Landscape Material Business For Sale

title: Landscape Material Business For Sale
text: Business Summary Real Estate Included-Stone & Landscape Material in Southern IL For Sale *MAJOR PRICE REDUCTION* This business sells building stone and landscaping materials to homeowners and contractors regionally. *NEW: The approximately 12 acres used by the business are now included in the sale. GREAT location. The business stocks many varieties of gravel, stone, boulders and mulch. They also sell specialty items such as stone benches, fences and water gardening supplies, as well as engraved and decorative stone. These items can be picked up or delivered. The asking price is well below the fair market value of the equipment and cost of inventory. Seller is motivated. Selling Price: $600,000 For more information, please contact Jennifer Hendrickson at 573-335-1885 . Financials
